attributes.action: introduce a compulsory charge on carrier bags in supermarkets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a charge is introduced, like it has successfully in Ireland, then people would start to bring their own bags to shops; thereby eliminating waste and resources and the world's precious energy in their unnecessary manufacture. Everyone has a load of these bags at home, all they need is a good reason not to take them in the first place.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already onlien:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/plastax/
If you would like your own to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
